All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
Alarm
Alarm represents an alarm generated by a remote monitored system.
AlarmState
The state and state machine of an Alarm
AsceDao
The pojo for the ASCE
AverageBySamples
AverageBySamples produces a new Double value by applying the arithmetic average of the samples.
AverageByTime
AverageByTime produces a new Double value by applying the arithmetic average of the samples received in the specified time frame.
BufferedFilePublisherBase
Base class for the publishers that write strings (with different format) on a file.
BufferedListenerPublisher
ListenerPublisher is an implementation of MonitorPointSender for testing the BufferedPublisherBase: monitor points are sent to the listener.
BufferedListenerPublisher.PublisherEventsListener
The interface to be notified about events happening in the BufferedPublisherBase.
BufferedMonitoredSystemData
The data structure encapsulating monitor point values and alarm retrieved from a monitored system and to be sent to the IAS core.
BufferedPublisherBase
Extends PublisherBase for publishing data to the IAS core with buffering.
Cache
A cache of IasioDao for the ValueMapper.
CassandraLtdbFeeder
The helper to interact with cassandra.
CassandraUtils
An helper to send commands to cassandra
CdbFiles
An interface to get the name of a file of the CDB independently of the adopted implementation.
CdbFolders
The structure of the folders and the names of the files of the CDB are described in the CDB wiki:
CdbReader
Interface to read data from the configuration database.
CdbReaderFactory
The factory to get the CdbReader implementation to use.
CdbTxtFiles
 
CdbWriter
Interface to flush the content of the CDB pojos in the configuration database Life cycle: CdbWriter.init() must be called to acquire the resources before invoking methods of this ineterface CdbWriter.shutdown() must be invoked to free the allocated resource when done using this interface
ChangeValueListener
The interface for the listener of changes in a monitored value.
ClientConfigDao
The pojo with the configuration of a IAS client The configuration is passed as a string.
CmdReplyThreadFactory
 
CommandExitStatus
The execution status of a command
CommandJsonSerializer
 
CommandListener
The interface of the listener of commands received from the command topic
CommandListener.CmdExecutionResult
The data structure that the listener returns to the CommandManager
CommandManager
The CommandManager base class for command executors subscribes as a consumer of the command topic and as a producer of the reply topic.
CommandManagerKafkaImpl
The CommandManagerKafkaImpl is the command executor that subscribes as a consumer of the kafka command topic to get commands and as producer of the kafka reply topic to publish replies Its task is to receive the commands on behalf of the process where it runs, discarding the commands targeted to other processes.
CommandMessage
The java POJO representing a command to be published in the command kafka topic This POJO is serialized into a JSON string to be published in the kafka topic
CommandSender
Objects of this class send commands and optionally wait for the reply through the kafka topics.
CommandStringSerializer
Interface to serialize/deserializer the CommandMessage to/from strings
CommandType
The commands supported by the core
ConfigurationDaoBase
Base class for the implementers of the IasioConfigurationDAO.
ConfigurationException
The exception returned by the configuration
Converter
The tool to convert raw monitor point values and alarms coming from plugins into IAS data type to be processed by the core.
ConverterKafkaStream
The kafka stream used by the converter to get JSON strings from the plugins and sends JSON strings to the core of the IAS.
ConverterStream
The interface to stream the strings received from the plugin (i.e.
ConverterStreamException
The exception returned by the converter stream.
DasuDao
The pojo for a DASU
DasuToDeployDao
The DAO with the DASU to be deployed in a Supervisor.
DefaultCommandExecutor
The DefaultCommandExecutor provides a default implementation of the commands defined in CommandType.
DetailedStatsCollector
Collects detailed statistics about updated of monitor point values.
FilePublisher
A publisher that dumps messages in the passed writer.
Filter
The interface defining filter to apply to a monitored value before sending to the IAS core.
Filter.EnrichedSample
The sample enriched with a flag to know if it has been generate before the refreshRate elapsed.
FilterBase
The basic class for the filters.
FilteredKafkaIasiosConsumer
FilteredKafkaIasiosConsumer allows to set a custom filter on top of the Kafka consumer.
FilteredKafkaIasiosConsumer.FilterIasValue
The filter to apply to IASValues
FilteredValue
The value returned after applying the filter.
FilterException
The exception returned by filtering
FilterFactory
The factory of filters.
HeartbeatMessagePojo
The a java pojo with the heartbeat message.
HeartbeatProducerType
The type of the producer of a Heartbeat Such type includes plugins, converters, Supervisor, clients...
HeartbeatStatus
The message sent by the heartbeat reporting the status of the tool.
IasCdbException
The exception type returned by the CDB.
IasDao
Global configuration for the IAS
IasioConfigurationDAO
The DAO interface to get the configuration of the DAO.
IasioDao
The pojo for the IASIO
IasIOJ<T>
The java countr part of the scala IasIO, that is the view of an InOut for the TF IasIOJ exposes only the InOut's methods that can be invoked by the TF hiding the methods meant for the internals of the IAS.
IasMonitorConfig
Java pojo with the configuration of the IASMonitor tool
IasTypeDao
The type of IASIOs.
IASTypes
Java representation of the IAS types.
IasValidity
 
IASValue<T>
The view of a heterogeneous inputs in the java code and in the BSDB.
IasValueJsonPojo
A java pojo to serialize/deserialize IASValue objects.
IasValueJsonSerializer
Serialize/deserialize IASValue to/from JSON strings
IasValueSerializerException
The exception returned serializing/deserializing IASValue objects to strings.
IasValueStringSerializer
 
IdentifierType
The types of an identifier of an IASIO.
JavaTransferExecutor<T>
The JavaTransferExecutor provides the interface for java implementators of the transfer function as java data structs differ from scala ones.
JsonAsceDao
Pojos for JSON that replaces objects inclusion in the ASCE with their IDS.
JsonDasuDao
Pojo for JSON that replaces object inclusion with their IDS.
JsonDasuToDeployDao
The DASU to deploy to replace the reference to the DASU ant the template with their IDs
JsonFilePublisher
A publisher that dumps JSON messages in the passed writer.
JsonSupervisorDao
JsonSupervisorDao encapsulate a SupervisorDao to replaces its set of DASUs with a set of IDs.
JsonTemplatedInputsDao
Templated inputs of the ASCE These are the inputs that belongs to a different template of that of the ASCE for which we need to specify the instance (@see #124)
KafkaHelper
A helper class providing useful methods and constants for Kafka
KafkaIasiosConsumer
Extends SimpleKafkaIasiosConsumer providing filtering by IDs and types.
KafkaIasiosProducer
KafkaIasioProducer writes IASValue in the kafka topic by delegating to SimpleStringProducer
KafkaPublisher
The publisher of monitor point values through Kafka.
KafkaSinkConnectorConfig
The configuration of kafka sink conenctor to monitor These kind of connectors do not pubish HBs and must be monitored with the REST API provided by kafka
KafkaStringsConsumer
A generic kafka consumer that forwards all the strings received in each message to the listener.
KafkaStringsConsumer.StreamPosition
The start position when connecting to a kafka topic for reading strings
KafkaStringsConsumer.StringsConsumer
The interface for the listener of strings
KafkaUtilsException
Exception retunrd by classes in KafkaUtils module
ListenerPublisher
ListenerPublisher is an implementation of MonitorPointSender for testing the BufferedPublisherBase: monitor points are sent to the listener.
ListenerPublisher.PublisherEventsListener
The interface to be notified about events happening in the BufferedPublisherBase.
LogLevelDao
The hibernate mapping for the log level (as defined by the minimum set of log levels recognized by the system according to slf4j).
LtdbKafkaConnector
The Kafka connector for the LTDB
LtdbKafkaTask
The task run by the kafka connector for the LTDB.
MessageDao
The message sent from the remote client to the networked plugin
MinMaxThresholdTFJava
The TF implementing a Min/Max threshold TF (there is also a scala implementation for comparison).
MonitorAlarm
An enumerated with all the alarms generated by the Monitor tool.
MonitoredValue
A MonitoredValue is a monitor point value or alarm read from the controlled system.
MonitorPointConfiguration
The configuration of the monitor point as read from the configuration database.
MonitorPointData
A java POJO representing a monitor point or alarm to be sent to the IAS.
MonitorPointDataToBuffer
A java POJO representing a monitor point or alarm to be sent to the IAS in a buffered way.
MonitorPointSender
The MonitorPointSender defines the interface to send monitor point values and alarms to the IAS core.
MonitorPointSender.SenderStats
The statistics provided by the sender in the last time interval.
NoneFilter
Default implementation of a filter: it does nothing but returning the value of the last acquired sample
NumericArray
The array of numbers is backed by a ArrayList of Numbers.
NumericArray.NumericArrayType
The supported types of array
OperationalMode
The operational mode of a monitor point value
Plugin
The main class to write IAS plugins.
PluginConfigDao
The java pojo with the plugin configuration.
PluginConfigException
The exception returned to notify problems with the configuration of a Plugin
PluginConfigFileReader
Read the plugin configuration from a JSON file.
PluginConfigGetter
Plugin configuration DAO.
PluginException
The exception returned by the Plugin
PluginFileConfig
The configuration of the plugin read from a JSON file differs from the provided in the CDB.
PluginThreadFactory
The thread factory for the plugin.
Priority
The priorities of the alarms The priorities are defined from the lowest to the highest so that the highest priority has also the greater ordinal number
PropertyDao
The property in the form of <name, value>
PublisherBase
Base class for publishing data to the core of the IAS: received monitor points are queued to be sent when the time interval (PublisherBase.throttlingTime) elapses or the max allowed size of the buffer has been reached
PublisherException
The exception returned by the Publisher
PythonExecutorTF<T>
Execution of TF in python is orchestrated by objects of this class: when there is a python TF, this transfer function implementation is executed: PythonExecutorTF delegates method execution to the python code through jep.
RdbReader
Deprecated.
RdbUtils
Deprecated.
RdbWriter
Deprecated.
ReplicatedIdsMapper
The mapper of monitor points ID to concrete ID in case the plugin is replicated.
ReplyJsonSerializer
 
ReplyKafkaConsumer
An helper class to easily consume replies from the kafka reply topic.
ReplyListener
The listener of replies
ReplyMessage
The java POJO to send replies over the kafka topic.
ReplyStringSerializer
Interface to serialize/deserializer the ReplyMessage to/from strings
Sample
A sample of the value read from the remote system.
SimpleKafkaIasiosConsumer
KafkaIasiosConsumer gets the strings from the passed IASIO kafka topic from the KafkaStringsConsumer and forwards the IASIOs to the listener.
SimpleKafkaIasiosConsumer.IasioListener
The listener to be notified of Iasios read from the kafka topic.
SimpleStringConsumer
/** Generic Kafka consumer to get strings from a kafka topic.
SimpleStringConsumer.KafkaConsumerListener
The listener to be notified of strings read from the kafka topic.
SimpleStringProducer
SimpleStringProducer pushes strings on a Kafka topic.
SoundTypeDao
The type of the sound to play when a alarm becomes set
SqlRunner
Deprecated.
Statistics
Collects and publishes detailed statistics.
StringSerializerException
Th eexception generated when marshalling or unmarshalling commands and replies to and from strings.
StructuredTextReader
 
StructuredTextWriter
 
SupervisorDao
The Supervisor is the container of DASUs needed to run more then one DASU in the same java process.
TemplateDao
The DAO for the template needed to support replication of identical devices.
TemplateInstanceIasioDao
The instance of an IASIO.
TextFileType
Formatted text file supported by the CDB
TFLanguageDao
The programming language supported by the TF.
TransferExecutor
TransferExecutor is the abstract for the implementators of the transfer function in java.
TransferFunctionDao
The DAO to handle the definition of the transfer function.
UdpPlugin
A plugin that gets monitor points and alarms from a UDP socket.
ValueDao
The value of a monitor point or alarm of plugin read from the monitored system.
ValueMapper
The function to convert a string received from a plugin (i.e.
ValueToSend
The value to send to the core of the IAS.
WebServerSender
The WebServerSender gets IASValues from the copre kafka topic and forwards them to the web server through websockets.
WebServerSender.WebServerSenderListener
The interface of the listener to be notified of Strings received by the WebServer sender.
